meanings.definition: A canine tooth, especially a pointed one.
meanings.sent1: The dogtooth of the wolf helps it tear meat.
meanings.sent2: The dentist examined the dogtooth of the patient.
meanings.sent3: The dogtooth of the puppy was causing it some discomfort.
meanings.sent4: His sharp wit was like a dogtooth, cutting through the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The dogtooth of the lion gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small, pointed, four-petaled flower design.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a beautiful dogtooth pattern on it.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of flowers, including one with a dogtooth.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome wore a hat with a dogtooth design.
meanings.sent4: The dogtooth on the fabric added a touch of elegance to the dress.
meanings.sent5: The dogtooth on the wallpaper gave the room a vintage feel.
